channel.title: Ghillie Scape - Help please with npc drops and color of teleports in emote tab
channel.description: Dear readers: I would like to know how to change npc drops. Also, on some servers, the teleports are in the emote tab. I wold like to know how to change the colors of the text in those teleports. Thanks, rjshoeie, (Dr Ghillie - Ghillie Scape)

item.title: Ghillie Scape - Help please with npc drops and color of teleports in emote tab
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Moved to server help.

item.title: Ghillie Scape - Help please with npc drops and color of teleports in emote tab
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Wrong section, use server help.

If your using a base with emotes in the emote tab, that means its shit no offence.
Use a Delta, its a base with most of necessary stuff coded in.

Npc drops are in config, under “npcdrops”

You’ll see how it works out.

And teleports in emotes tab search for colors

example: Green - @gre@ - The 1st 3 letters of a color

Read full topic
item.source: Ghillie Scape - Help please with npc drops and color of teleports in emote tab
